data.oai_dc:dc: Phenotypic measurements for Joshua tree. Includes measurements not analyzed in the present manuscript: crown diameter in meters (crown dia), branch count (branch #), lengths in centimeters and widths in millimeters for five leaves (l1, w1, l2, w2, l3, w3, l4, w4, l5, w5), total tree height in meters (tree_h), height to first branching in meters (h_1st_br), petal length and width in mm (pet_l and pet_w), diagonal length of a petal in mm (pet_diag), total pistil length and width in mm (pis_l and pis_w), style length, basal width, and midpoint width in mm (sty_l, sty_bw, sty_mw).
